argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | usgedgppr.e | |- E = ( Edges ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( C e. E <-> C e. ( Edges ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_edg | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. ( Edges ` G ) ) -> ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( C e. ~P ( 1st ` G ) /\ ( # ` C ) = 2 ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ C e. E ) -> ( # ` C ) = 2 ) |
